column4: help! I'd like to configure Feisty so that all users, current and future, can access m$ network shares over nautilus. Do I need fusesmb, is there a multi user tutorial anywhere ?
its already set up that way
they just go to places -> network

in directories rather

make sure everybody is in the same workgroup?
